# List of all dependencies of larch
# Recommended installation with conda:
# conda config --env --append channels GSECARS
# conda config --env --append channels conda-forge
# conda install --file ./requirements.txt

numpy>=1.12
matplotlib>=3.0

peakutils
requests

asteval>=0.9.19
lmfit>=1.0
uncertainties>=3.1
pyshortcuts>=1.7.2
xraydb>=4.4
pip
pyyaml
pytest
termcolor
silx>=0.12
